long_description: With fun graphics and reliable performance, the Zippo Mountain Top Windproof Lighter will go with you wherever you roam. It will start a campfire or light your cook stove for years to come. Dependable, reusable lighter burns Zippo lighter fluid (sold separately). Wick and flint can be replaced to keep the Zippo Mountain Top Windproof Lighter operating at peak performance (replacement parts sold separately).
short_description: With fun graphics and reliable performance, the Zippo Mountain Top Windproof Lighter will go with you wherever you roam. It will start a campfire or light your cook stove for years to come.
